(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (NP (DT this))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT an)
        (ADJP
          (ADJP (JJ excellent))
          (CC and)
          (ADJP (RB rather) (JJ unexpected)))
        (NN discovery)))
    (. !)))


advmod(discovery-9, Now-1)
nsubj(discovery-9, this-2)
cop(discovery-9, is-3)
det(discovery-9, an-4)
amod(discovery-9, excellent-5)
cc(excellent-5, and-6)
advmod(unexpected-8, rather-7)
conj(excellent-5, unexpected-8)
root(ROOT-0, discovery-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Makanuncle) (NNP smart))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBG wondering)
        (PP (IN around)
          (NP (DT this) (NN area)))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB when))
          (S
            (NP (PRP he))
            (VP (VBD spied)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN soup) (NN shop))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT which))
                  (S
                    (VP (`` ``) (VBG Bakes) ('' '')
                      (NP
                        (NP (PRP$ its) (NN soup))
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP (DT a) (JJ Traditional) (NNP Chinese) (NNP Soup) (NNP Urn)))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJS Most))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNS soups))
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (VBP find)
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN food) (NNS courts)))))))))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBN steamed)
        (NP
          (NP (NN soup))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (VP (VBZ works)
                (PP (IN on)
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN principal)))
                (SBAR (IN as)
                  (S
                    (S
                      (NP
                        (NP (JJ double) (NN boil) (NN soup))
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP (DT that) (JJ boiled) (NN water)
                            (CC or)
                            (NN steam))))
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (VP (VBN used)
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB slow)
                                (NP (NN cook))

                                  (NP (DT the) (NN soup))
                                  (RB so))

                                  (S
                                    (NP (PRP it))
                                    (VP (MD would) (RB not)
                                      (VP (VB evaporate)))))))))))
                    (CC and)
                    (S
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN goodness))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (DT the) (NNS ingredients))))
                      (VP (VBP are)
                        (ADVP (RB slowly))
                        (VP (VBN extracted)
                          (PP (IN from)
                            (NP (DT the) (NN soup))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

        (VP (VBP get)
          (NP

root(ROOT-0, better-3)
advmod(get-6, when-4)
nsubj(get-6, you-5)
dep(better-3, get-6)
det(pot-9, a-7)
amod(pot-9, whole-8)
dobj(get-6, pot-9)
dep(of-11, full-10)
prep(pot-9, of-11)
pobj(of-11, ingredients-12)
prep(ingredients-12, for-13)
pobj(for-13, $-14)


(ROOT
  (NP (FW 3.50) (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, 3.50-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADVP (RB definitely))
      (VP (VBG going)
        (PRT (RP back))
        (NP (JJ next) (NN week))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB try)
              (NP
                (NP (PRP$ their) (NN signature) (NNP Pig) (NNP Tail) (NN soup))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT which))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBD was)
                      (VP (VBN sold)
                        (PP (IN out)
                          (NP (DT that) (NN day)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(going-4, I-1)
aux(going-4, am-2)
advmod(going-4, definitely-3)
root(ROOT-0, going-4)
prt(going-4, back-5)
amod(week-7, next-6)
tmod(going-4, week-7)
aux(try-9, to-8)
xcomp(going-4, try-9)
poss(soup-14, their-10)
nn(soup-14, signature-11)
nn(soup-14, Pig-12)
nn(soup-14, Tail-13)
dobj(try-9, soup-14)
nsubjpass(sold-17, which-15)
auxpass(sold-17, was-16)
rcmod(soup-14, sold-17)
prep(sold-17, out-18)
det(day-20, that-19)
pobj(out-18, day-20)
